Bash(ssh root@116.202.214.38 "echo ''package main
import \(
	""fmt""
	""encoding/hex""
	""golang.org/x/crypto/sha3""
\)
func main\(\) {
	adi := ""certen-kermit-11.acme""
	hash := sha3.Sum256\([]byte\(adi\)\)
	routingNum := hash[:8]
	fmt.Printf\(""ADI: %s\\n"", adi\)
	fmt.Printf\(""Routing number: %s\\n"", hex.EncodeToString\(routingNum\)\)
	fmt.Printf\(""First byte: %02x \(binary: %08b\)\\n"", routingNum[0], routingNum[0]\)
}'' > /tmp/route.go && go run /tmp/route.go 2>&1")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd 'C:\\Accumulate_Stuff\\certen\\independant_validator\\scripts'; node -e \\"const { ethers } = require\('ethers'\); async function check\(\) { const provider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider\('https://ethereum-sepolia-rpc.publicnode.com'\); const addrs = ['0xEAE57DBBd8A096F7dB0d4901774d0996762c614e', '0x354d53a095E0dff617805f17C12c5F86ADF65a36', '0xa68224627D38fa4b1eC60911EDD0F7eA26f1Cc73', '0x56E4187e901a7bAb9A5BdBe7487E39A0bbc6442F']; for \(let i=0; i<addrs.length; i++\) { const bal = await provider.getBalance\(addrs[i]\); console.log\('validator-' + \(i+1\) + ': ' + ethers.formatEther\(bal\) + ' ETH'\); } } check\(\).catch\(console.error\);\\":*)
